title: GET_VEHICLE_FUEL_LEVEL
content:
0x5F739BB// GetVehicleFuelLevel
float GET_VEHICLE_FUEL_LEVEL(Vehicle vehicle);Returns the current fuel level of a vehicle in liters.
codeBlocks:
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_FUEL_LEVEL
local veh = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
local fuel = GetVehicleFuelLevel(veh)
if fuel <= 0.0 then
    SetVehicleEngineOn(veh, false, true, true)
end
